alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 1:10PM PDT until March 30 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Antelope Valley Foothills, Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From noon Wednesday to 6 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
